languages.text: "У нас так все устроено, чтобы, если кого-то поймают, остальных не нашли. Но я стащил у главного {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}... думал — когда убьем губернатора, хочу найти штаб по координатам посланий и спрятаться там..." {n}Мальчишка выуживает из кармана вокс и протягивает его вам дрожащей рукой.{/n} "Вот и все, что я знаю, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: "У нас так все устроено, чтобы, если кого-то поймают, остальных не нашли. Но я стащил у главного вокс... думал — когда убьем губернатора, хочу найти штаб по координатам посланий и спрятаться там...". {n}Мальчишка выуживает из кармана вокс и протягивает его вам дрожащей рукой.{/n} "Вот и все, что я знаю, Ваше Благородие".

languages.text: "We have it all worked out so that if anyone gets caught, the others aren't caught with them. But I swiped the chief's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}... I thought, after I killed the governor, I could use the message coordinates to find the base and hide out there..." {n}The boy retrieves a vox from his pocket and holds it out to you with a shaking hand.{/n} "That's everything I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: "У нас так все устроено, чтобы, если кого-то поймают, остальных не нашли. Но я стащил у главного {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс{/g}... думал — когда убьем губернатора, хочу найти штаб по координатам посланий и спрятаться там..." {n}Мальчишка выуживает из кармана вокс и протягивает его вам дрожащей рукой.{/n} "Вот и все, что я знаю, Ваша Светлость".

I thought, after I killed the governor, I could use the message coordinates to find the base and hide out there..." {n}The boy retrieves a vox from his pocket and holds it out to you with a shaking hand.{/n} "That's everything I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

I thought, after I killed the governor, I could use the message coordinates to find the base and hide out there..." {n}The boy retrieves a vox from his pocket and holds it out to you with a shaking hand.{/n} "That's everything I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

I thought, after I killed the governor, I could use the message coordinates to find the base and hide out there..." {n}The boy retrieves a vox from his pocket and holds it out to you with a shaking hand.{/n} "That's everything I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"We have it all worked out so that if anyone gets caught, the others aren't caught with them. But I swiped the chief's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}... I thought, after I killed the governor, I could use the message coordinates to find the base and hide out there..." {n}The boy retrieves a vox from his pocket and holds it out to you with a shaking hand.{/n} "That's everything I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: 「もし誰かがつかまっても、他の人が一緒につかまることのないように、僕らは何事もうまくやってきました。けど、僕は長官の{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}を盗んで…総督を殺したら、このメッセージ座標を使って基地を見つけて、そこに隠れようと思ったんです…」{n}少年は自分のポケットからヴォクスを取り出すと、震える手であなたに差し出した。{/n}「僕が知っていることはこれで全部です、陛下」
languages.original_text: "We have it all worked out so that if anyone gets caught, the others aren't caught with them. But I swiped the chief's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}... I thought, after I killed the governor, I could use the message coordinates to find the base and hide out there..." {n}The boy retrieves a vox from his pocket and holds it out to you with a shaking hand.{/n} "That's everything I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: 「もし誰かがつかまっても、他の人が一緒につかまることのないように、僕らは何事もうまくやってきました。けど、僕は長官の{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}を盗んで…総督を殺したら、このメッセージ座標を使って基地を見つけて、そこに隠れようと思ったんです…」{n}少年は自分のポケットからヴォクスを取り出すと、震える手であなたに差し出した。{/n}「僕が知っていることはこれで全部です、陛下」

languages.text: “我们都计划好了，就算有人被抓住了，剩下的人也不会因此被抓。不过，我偷走了头头的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}设备……我在想，等我杀了那个总督之后，我可以利用这个设备里的坐标找到基地，躲在那里……”{n}男孩从口袋里掏出了音阵设备，颤抖着递给了你。{/n}“我只知道这些了，大人。”
languages.original_text: "We have it all worked out so that if anyone gets caught, the others aren't caught with them. But I swiped the chief's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}... I thought, after I killed the governor, I could use the message coordinates to find the base and hide out there..." {n}The boy retrieves a vox from his pocket and holds it out to you with a shaking hand.{/n} "That's everything I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: “我们都计划好了，就算有人被抓住了，剩下的人也不会因此被抓。不过，我偷走了头头的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}设备……我在想，等我杀了那个总督之后，我可以利用这个设备里的坐标找到基地，躲在那里……”{n}男孩从口袋里掏出了音阵设备，颤抖着递给了你。{/n}“我只知道这些了，大人。”

languages.text: «Nos las habíamos maravillado para que los demás no pagaran el pato si a alguien lo pillaban. Pero me dio por robarle el {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} al jefe... y pensé que, si mataba a la gobernadora, podría usar las coordenadas del mensaje para encontrar la base y esconderme allí». {n}El muchacho saca un voco del bolsillo y te lo entrega con la mano temblorosa.{/n} «Ya no sé nada más, {mf|milord|milady}».
languages.original_text: "We have it all worked out so that if anyone gets caught, the others aren't caught with them. But I swiped the chief's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}... I thought, after I killed the governor, I could use the message coordinates to find the base and hide out there..." {n}The boy retrieves a vox from his pocket and holds it out to you with a shaking hand.{/n} "That's everything I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: «Nos las habíamos maravillado para que los demás no pagaran el pato si a alguien lo pillaban. Pero me dio por robarle el {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} al jefe... y pensé que, si mataba a la gobernadora, podría usar las coordenadas del mensaje para encontrar la base y esconderme allí». {n}El muchacho saca un voco del bolsillo y te lo entrega con la mano temblorosa.{/n} «Ya no sé nada más, {mf|milord|milady}».

languages.text: "Wir haben alles geplant: Wenn doch mal einer erwischt wird, betrifft es keine anderen. Aber ich habe das {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} des Häuptlings geklaut ... Ich dachte, nachdem ich die Gouverneurin getötet habe, kann ich mit den Koordinaten der Nachrichten die Basis finden und mich dort verstecken ..." {n}Der Junge holt ein Vox aus der Tasche und hält es dir zitternd entgegen.{/n} "Mehr weiß ich nicht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: "We have it all worked out so that if anyone gets caught, the others aren't caught with them. But I swiped the chief's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}... I thought, after I killed the governor, I could use the message coordinates to find the base and hide out there..." {n}The boy retrieves a vox from his pocket and holds it out to you with a shaking hand.{/n} "That's everything I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben alles geplant: Wenn doch mal einer erwischt wird, betrifft es keine anderen. Aber ich habe das {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} des Häuptlings geklaut ... Ich dachte, nachdem ich die Gouverneurin getötet habe, kann ich mit den Koordinaten der Nachrichten die Basis finden und mich dort verstecken ..." {n}Der Junge holt ein Vox aus der Tasche und hält es dir zitternd entgegen.{/n} "Mehr weiß ich nicht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: « Si l'un des nôtres se fait prendre, tout est prévu pour éviter aux autres d'être compromis. Sauf que j'ai piqué le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} du chef... Je me suis dit qu'après avoir tué la gouverneure, je pourrais utiliser les coordonnées du message pour retrouver la base et aller m'y planquer. » {n}Le garçon sort un vox de sa poche et vous le tend d'une main tremblante.{/n} « C'est tout ce que je sais, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "We have it all worked out so that if anyone gets caught, the others aren't caught with them. But I swiped the chief's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}... I thought, after I killed the governor, I could use the message coordinates to find the base and hide out there..." {n}The boy retrieves a vox from his pocket and holds it out to you with a shaking hand.{/n} "That's everything I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: « Si l'un des nôtres se fait prendre, tout est prévu pour éviter aux autres d'être compromis. Sauf que j'ai piqué le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} du chef... Je me suis dit qu'après avoir tué la gouverneure, je pourrais utiliser les coordonnées du message pour retrouver la base et aller m'y planquer. » {n}Le garçon sort un vox de sa poche et vous le tend d'une main tremblante.{/n} « C'est tout ce que je sais, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: "Her şeyi, biri yakalanırsa diğerlerine bir şey olmayacak şekilde planladık ama şefin {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksunu{/g} yürüttüm. Düşündüm ki valiyi öldürdükten sonra mesaj koordinatlarını kullanıp üssü bulur, orada saklanırım." {n}Çocuk, cebinden bir voks çıkarıp titreyen elleriyle sana uzatıyor.{/n} "Bildiğim her şey bundan ibaret {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: "We have it all worked out so that if anyone gets caught, the others aren't caught with them. But I swiped the chief's {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}... I thought, after I killed the governor, I could use the message coordinates to find the base and hide out there..." {n}The boy retrieves a vox from his pocket and holds it out to you with a shaking hand.{/n} "That's everything I know, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: "Her şeyi, biri yakalanırsa diğerlerine bir şey olmayacak şekilde planladık ama şefin {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g}unu yürüttüm. Düşündüm ki valiyi öldürdükten sonra mesaj koordinatlarını kullanıp üssü bulur, orada saklanırım." {n}Çocuk cebinden bir voks çıkarıyor ve titreyen elleriyle sana uzatıyor.{/n} "Bildiğim her şey bundan ibaret {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
